titles.title: A bill to provide for the appointment of additional judges for the district of New Mexico.
A bill to provide for the appointment of additional judges for the district of New Mexico.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Advice and consent of the Senate

bill.summary:
Requires the President to appoint two additional permanent district judges and one additional temporary district judge for the District of New Mexico.
States that the first vacancy in the office of district judge in such district occurring ten years or more after confirmation of the temporary district judge shall not be filled.
